title: Iconic Uluṟu Outback Retreat with Field of Light Star Pass & Daily Breakfast
description:
A mirage of iconic white sail-shaped awnings signals your arrival at the five-star Sails in the Desert, where mighty Uluṟu and the Red Centre's soul-stirring landscape serves as an unforgettable backdrop. A member of the renowned Pullman Hotels collection, this unique hotel interweaves the magic and breathtaking beauty of the outback into every aspect of its design. Offering a wealth of unmissable experiences as vast as the desert it crowns, this iconic outback oasis is your launchpad for delving deep into Australia's roots.

Listen to stories of Aboriginal culture during a 'Bush Yarns' session, immerse yourself in the enchanting sounds of the didgeridoo with a workshop, or take a guided garden walk highlighting the seasonal local flora, bush foods and trees native to Australia and the medicines traditionally used. Watch as darkness transforms into a bloom of soft light and colour at the renowned Field of Light Uluṟu installation by artist Bruce Munro or escape the crowds on a desert awakening and find a secluded sand dune to watch the sun roll above Uluṟu - an unforgettable moment etched in your memory for years to come. In between experiences, retreat from the heat with a dip in the gumtree-lined pool or linger over unique Australian flavours at one of the resort's exceptional restaurants.
offer_address: 163 Yulara Drive, Yulara, Northern Territory 0872, Australia

title: Uluru: Once-in-a-Lifetime Outback Experience with Field of Light Star Pass
description: A mirage of iconic white sail-shaped awnings signals your arrival at the five-star Sails in the Desert, where Uluru and the vibrant landscape of Australia’s Red Centre serve as a striking backdrop. A member of the iconic Pullman Hotels collection, this outback escape offers true luxury in Australia’s spiritual heart with passes for the renowned Field of Light Uluru art installation by Bruce Munro included in your stay. Enjoy three nights in a Superior Double Room with daily à la carte breakfast, return airport transfers, complimentary Indigenous guest activities and Wi-Fi.
offer_address: 163 Yulara Drive, Yulara, Northern Territory 0872, Australia

title: Outback Bestseller: Iconic Uluṟu Retreat with Field of Light, Daily Breakfast & One-Time Ilkaṟi Dinner
description:
A mirage of iconic white sail-shaped awnings signals your arrival at this five-star outback stay, where mighty Uluṟu, Kata Tjuṯa and the Red Centre's soul-stirring landscape serves as an unforgettable backdrop as you delve deep into Australia's roots at Voyages Ayers Rock Resort.

Listen to stories of Aboriginal culture during a 'Bush Yarns' session, immerse yourself in Indigenous Dot Art at the Gallery of Central Australia, or take a guided garden walk highlighting the seasonal local flora, bush foods and trees native to the region.

Watch as darkness transforms into a bloom of soft light and colour at the renowned Field of Light Uluṟu installation by artist Bruce Munro, or escape the crowds on a desert awakening and find a secluded sand dune to watch the sun rise above Uluṟu - an unforgettable moment that will be etched in your memory for years to come.

A member of the renowned Pullman Hotels collection, this unique hotel interweaves the magic and breathtaking beauty of the outback into every aspect of its design. In between experiences, retreat from the heat with a dip in the gumtree-lined pool or linger over unique Australian flavours at one of the resort's exceptional restaurants.
offer_address: 163 Yulara Drive, Yulara, Northern Territory 0872, Australia

title: Uluru: Once-in-a-Lifetime Outback Experience with Sunrise Field of Light Tour
description:
Unearth the immensity, grandeur and mystery of Australia’s Red Centre, a spiritual place where one of the world’s oldest cultures still thrives, with a stay at Sails in the Desert, so-called because of its iconic white sail-shaped awnings. Discover Uluru’s raw natural beauty with a premium outback holiday experience over three nights in a Superior Double Room. Experience the renowned Field of Light Uluru art installation by Bruce Munro with an Uluru sunrise tour to watch thousands of spindles of warm light glow and breathe - an unmissable, unforgettable moment. You'll also enjoy daily buffet breakfast, a buffet dinner, a bottle of wine in-room on arrival, return airport transfers and more.

**Upgrade** to the Uluru Sunset package to watch the sunset over Uluru-Kata Tjuta National Park with a glass of sparkling wine.
offer_address: 163 Yulara Drive, Yulara, Northern Territory 0872, Australia

title: 5-Star Uluru Glamping with All-Inclusive Dining, Drinks & Airport Transfers
description: Marvel at the majestic beauty of Uluru with a once-in-a-lifetime stay at the spectacular Longitude 131°. Nestled among the rich red dunes of Uluru-Kata Tjuta National Park, Longitude 131° is a bucket-list destination, a safari-style luxe retreat promising guests an unforgettable escape amid the impressive outback scenery. Engage in a unique Australian dining experience with a stunning desert backdrop, and explore the natural wonders of the Northern Territory. Each intimate tent and pavilion offers expansive, uninterrupted views of Uluru and Kata Tjuta; a truly unparalleled opportunity to connect with Australia's gorgeous Red Centre.
offer_address: Yulara Drive, Yulara, Northern Territory 0872 Australia
